pattern.name: Time aggregate since event
pattern.description:
Time since event E till the time when the prediction is required (defined with @baseDate). If multiple events E are present, return the time from the most recent event. If no event E exists, return null.
In comparison to "time since", this works on sets. In comparison to "time aggregate since" we also add a filter.
pattern.example: Time since the last mortgage contract.
pattern.author: Jan Motl
pattern.code: SELECT @base , @aggregateFunction(DATEDIFF(@baseDate, @temporalColumn)) AS @columnName FROM @propagatedTable WHERE @nominalColumn='@value' GROUP BY @base
